select * from sms_scan t where del = 1
AND t.delivery like concat('%',#{scan.delivery},'%')
AND t.mat_code like concat('%',#{scan.matCode},'%')
AND t.batch like concat('%',#{scan.batch},'%')
AND t.box_code like concat('%',#{scan.boxCode},'%')
And date_format(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{scan.startTime} and #{scan.endTime}
order by t.create_time desc

select distinct t.delivery ,h.status,h.plant,h.sold_party,h.ship_party from sms_scan t left join sms_header h on t.delivery = h.delivery where t.del = 1
AND t.delivery like concat('%',#{scan.delivery},'%')
order by t.create_time desc
select t.*,d.quantity as count from sms_scan t left join sms_detail d on t.delivery = d.delivery and t.mat_code = d.material and t.batch = d.roche_batch where t.delivery = #{delivery} and t.del = 1
